cta.title: Start Building
cta.subtitle: Ship faster with intelligent tooling and AI assistance.

features.heading: Effortless Task Management
features.lead: Automate your tasks and workflows by connecting your favorite tools like Notion, Todoist, and more. AI-powered scheduling helps you stay on track and adapt to changing priorities.
features.blockquote: Wow, auto-generated pages are the kind of thing that you don't even know you need until you see it. It's like an AI-native CRM.
features.creator: Creator

faqs.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faqs.refundBody: We offer a 30-day money back guarantee. If you are not satisfied with our product, you can request a refund within 30 days of your purchase.
faqs.refundStep1: To request a refund, please contact our support team with your order number and reason for the refund.
faqs.refundStep2: Refunds will be processed within 3-5 business days.
faqs.refundStep3: Please note that refunds are only available for new customers and are limited to one per customer.
faqs.cancelHeading: How do I cancel my subscription?
faqs.cancelBody: You can cancel your subscription at any time by logging into your account and clicking on the cancel button.
faqs.upgradeBody: Yes, you can upgrade your plan at any time by logging into your account and selecting the plan you want to upgrade to.
faqs.supportBody: We do not offer phone support at this time. However, you can contact us via email or live chat for any questions or concerns you may have.
